caption.center: STATE of New Mexico, Petitioner, v. Honorable Joe ANGEL, District Judge,

opinion.posture: Original Prohibition or Writ of Superintending Control or Both.
opinion.opinion_text:
CHAVEZ, Chief Justice, and NOBLE, MOISE, COMPTON and CARMODY, Justices, concurring.
Ordered that the petition be and the same is hereby denied.Page 706
